attributes.name: event
attributes.description: Telemetry event name emitted by app.py (heartbeat, device_status, ml_classify, ml_bench, led_state, load_state, job_state).

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Event status value such as ok, error, busy, started, or done.

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Error details when a command or job fails.

attributes.name: sdk_version
attributes.description: IoTConnect Lite SDK version running on the device application.

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Benchmark request mode (sw, hw, or both).

attributes.name: input_class
attributes.description: Input waveform class requested for inference, in range 0..5.

attributes.name: pred
attributes.description: Predicted output class for the latest inference, in range 0..5.

attributes.name: sw_pred
attributes.description: Predicted class from software-only inference path.

attributes.name: hw_pred
attributes.description: Predicted class from hardware-accelerated inference path.

attributes.name: seed
attributes.description: Pseudo-random seed used for deterministic waveform/noise generation.

attributes.name: batch_n
attributes.description: Number of inference samples processed in the command run.

attributes.name: pred_mode_count
attributes.description: Count of times the mode class prediction occurred across a batch run.

attributes.name: match_count
attributes.description: Number of predictions equal to requested input class across the batch.

attributes.name: match_rate
attributes.description: Fraction of predictions matching the requested class (0.0 to 1.0).

attributes.name: sw_match_rate
attributes.description: Software-path batch match ratio for requested class (0.0 to 1.0).

attributes.name: hw_match_rate
attributes.description: Hardware-path batch match ratio for requested class (0.0 to 1.0).

attributes.name: scores_csv
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of per-class integer scores.

attributes.name: score0
attributes.description: Raw classification score for class 0.

attributes.name: score1
attributes.description: Raw classification score for class 1.

attributes.name: score2
attributes.description: Raw classification score for class 2.

attributes.name: score3
attributes.description: Raw classification score for class 3.

attributes.name: score4
attributes.description: Raw classification score for class 4.

attributes.name: score5
attributes.description: Raw classification score for class 5.

attributes.name: time_s
attributes.description: Single inference execution time.

attributes.name: avg_time_s
attributes.description: Average inference time over the batch run.

attributes.name: total_time_s
attributes.description: Total execution time for all inferences in the batch run.

attributes.name: sw_avg_time_s
attributes.description: Average execution time in software-only mode.

attributes.name: sw_total_time_s
attributes.description: Total execution time in software-only mode.

attributes.name: hw_avg_time_s
attributes.description: Average execution time in hardware-accelerated mode.

attributes.name: hw_total_time_s
attributes.description: Total execution time in hardware-accelerated mode.

attributes.name: speedup_sw_over_hw
attributes.description: Speedup ratio computed as sw_avg_time_s divided by hw_avg_time_s.

attributes.name: speedup_hw_over_sw
attributes.description: Speedup ratio computed as hw_avg_time_s divided by sw_avg_time_s.

attributes.name: uptime_s
attributes.description: Device Linux uptime in seconds.

attributes.name: load_1m
attributes.description: Linux system load average for the last 1 minute.

attributes.name: load_5m
attributes.description: Linux system load average for the last 5 minutes.

attributes.name: load_15m
attributes.description: Linux system load average for the last 15 minutes.

attributes.name: cpu_usage_pct
attributes.description: CPU utilization percentage sampled from /proc/stat.

attributes.name: mem_total_kb
attributes.description: Total system memory reported by Linux.

attributes.name: mem_available_kb
attributes.description: Available memory for new workloads.

attributes.name: mem_free_kb
attributes.description: Current free memory reported by Linux.

attributes.name: disk_total_mb
attributes.description: Total root filesystem capacity.

attributes.name: disk_free_mb
attributes.description: Free root filesystem capacity.

attributes.name: thermal_zone_count
attributes.description: Number of thermal zones detected in Linux sysfs.

attributes.name: temp_max_c
attributes.description: Hottest thermal zone temperature.

attributes.name: temp_max_zone
attributes.description: Name/type of the hottest thermal zone.

attributes.name: random
attributes.description: Heartbeat random value (0..100) used for liveness visibility.

attributes.name: load_active
attributes.description: True when synthetic CPU load workers are currently running.

attributes.name: load_workers
attributes.description: Number of active load-generator worker threads.

attributes.name: load_duty_pct
attributes.description: Configured busy duty cycle for load workers.

attributes.name: led_count
attributes.description: Number of visible LEDs exposed to the application.

attributes.name: leds
attributes.description: 8-bit LED state string where 1 is on and 0 is off.

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: Action taken for led/load command telemetry.

attributes.name: requested
attributes.description: Requested value passed for setbits LED operations.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Target LED name or command target value.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: LED pattern name (blink, chase, alternate).

attributes.name: cycles
attributes.description: Number of cycles requested for the LED pattern worker.

attributes.name: interval_ms
attributes.description: LED pattern step interval in milliseconds.

attributes.name: level
attributes.description: Optional LED brightness level used by the pattern worker.

attributes.name: active_job
attributes.description: Current busy asynchronous job name when a new request is rejected.

attributes.name: job
attributes.description: Asynchronous job identifier for job_state telemetry.
